metadata.name: Complete All Nodes Workflow
metadata.description: Comprehensive workflow demonstrating all node types: Start, End, Python (2x), TypeScript (2x), HTTP API, File Operations (2x), Markdown Viewer, Conditional Logic, Database Query, LLM AI Assistant, and For Each Loop

python_data_generator.title: Python Data Generator
python_data_generator.code:
import json
from datetime import datetime
import random

def run(input):
    # Generate sample data for processing
    products = [
        {'id': 1, 'name': 'Laptop', 'category': 'Electronics', 'price': 999.99},
        {'id': 2, 'name': 'Mouse', 'category': 'Accessories', 'price': 29.99},
        {'id': 3, 'name': 'Keyboard', 'category': 'Accessories', 'price': 79.99},
        {'id': 4, 'name': 'Monitor', 'category': 'Electronics', 'price': 299.99},
        {'id': 5, 'name': 'Headphones', 'category': 'Audio', 'price': 149.99}
    ]
    
    return {
        'items': products,
        'total_items': len(products),
        'workflow_id': f'WF-{random.randint(1000, 9999)}',
        'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(),
        'status': 'processing',
        'user_id': random.randint(100, 999)
    }

typescript_enhancer.title: TypeScript Data Enhancer

config.system: You are a product analysis assistant. Provide brief, concise analysis.
config.user: Analyze this product: {name} in category {category} priced at ${price}. Provide a one-sentence analysis.

config.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS workflow_logs (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, workflow_id TEXT, status TEXT, total_value REAL, created_at TEXT)
INSERT INTO workflow_logs (workflow_id, status, total_value, created_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)

python_final_processor.title: Python Final Processor
python_final_processor.code:
from datetime import datetime
import json

def run(input):
    # Final processing and summary generation
    summary = {
        'workflow_completed': True,
        'workflow_id': input.get('workflow_id', 'unknown'),
        'completed_at': datetime.now().isoformat(),
        'route_taken': input.get('route', 'unknown'),
        'action': input.get('action', 'unknown'),
        'priority': input.get('priority', 'unknown'),
        'total_value': input.get('metadata', {}).get('totalValue', 0),
        'items_processed': input.get('total_items', 0),
        'external_data_fetched': 'http' in str(input).lower(),
        'status': 'success'
    }
    
    return summary

typescript_formatter.title: TypeScript Formatter
